Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Eatsbound Reroute near Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison and #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Balbo, Columbus, Ida B. Wells, and Congress due to, street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Leavitt
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Western, Grand, Damen, and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Leavitt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
